<title level="1" right="Rules">[Attacking with a Staff](/Rules.aspx?ID=754)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 592 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Staves are also [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12) weapons. They can be etched with [fundamental runes](/equipment/runes/fundamental-weapon-runes) but not [property runes](/equipment/runes/weapon-property-runes). This doesn't alter any of their spellcasting abilities.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Attacking with a Staff
